name: Crimson Earth 2
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Directx 9.0 compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i5(i7) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 970 GTX DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Directx 9.0 compatible Sound Card
